title: In Memory of David A. Arnold
description:
We're remembering comedian, writer, and actor, David A. Arnold on Comedy Gold Minds this week, by revisiting the time he sat down with Kevin earlier this year. The pair talk all things comedy including developing and selling a show together at Hulu, being told he wasn’t marketable by BET, why timing is everything in the entertainment industry, and his new Netflix special “David A. Arnold: It Ain’t for the Weak”.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (david a. arnold, kevin hart)
